Text: Me̩ je̩nyu ñw Jihofa!
E̩ne̩ akeka e̩wñ ukpahiu ki Jihofa ache?
Abo ku ma fʼajo̩ o̩kpakpa eka de gbede,
E̩ nalibekado mi, O Jihofa, alu kʼe̩ li amone̩-we̩ eju;
kʼomi kʼu li alu ki ara ñw abo kʼuwe̩ chi,
Tʼawa tʼamata-wa fʼuwe̩ dure me̩;
Amata-wa ma oji e̩wñ aye
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ i fʼuma jadu tod odu e-wñ,
I ño̩ dejuru Ohimini Ekpikpa oñ omi-wñ gbe̩;
Abe̩le̩ i fʼuma jadu kwef o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi chʼulaka ma le̩,
Tak omiofo le̩ kwo bʼabo ku ma che ma o̩pe̩cha le̩ oji ma;
E̩gba le̩ taku ma dʼo̩la-wñ rʼochochi;
Ma hika gbenyo̩ uko̩lo̩ kʼi che;
Ama ma jʼachʼe̩ño̩ e̩wñ tabale ef aje̩tachi le̩,
i la kʼe̩wñ ku ma biʼu ñw ma,
Ma ño̩ lie̩na Mose̩s ef uru le̩ kpai Aro̩n, e̩ne̩ Jihofa kʼi afo̩ le̩,
ane̩ ile̩-i mʼalu chi te̩ oñ i mu Detan du mi,
Ma la fʼuna ko alumeji abo-ma;
Ma fʼo̩ma okuno̩ che Ho̩re̩b
Abe̩le̩ ma mʼojima e-ma du kpailo̩
Ma gbenyo̩ O̩jo̩, E̩najadu-ma,
kpʼuko̩lo̩ aye ane̩ Ham,
Todule̩ i ka kʼi akpa ma bie̩—
Taku ma kwoche̩de̩te̩ ane̩ ube̩do̩ le̩,
Ma la keñmini ef unyabo-ma,
Todule̩ i dʼo̩wo̩-wñ kwane̩ ñw ma
kʼi año̩ je̩ ñw amugbe̩-ma wane̩ ef abo uche̩ichi,
Ma kʼo̩la-ma dama kpai Beal-peo̩r,
ma nʼe̩wñ ku ma che le bi owñ eju,
Taku Finehas kwodago oñ i che alu kʼoj ajo̩ ka,
Ma fʼe-le̩ lorʼowñ ka kʼo̩kpakpa de̩,
Ma ño̩ gwʼowñ uwe̩do̩ o̩la omi Me̩riba le̩
todu ma lañu rʼafu-wñ,
Ma kpa amone̩ le̩ rinyo̩,
ma muda kʼo̩la-ma gwe̩gwa nyʼef abo uche̩ichi,
Ma la fʼode ode-ma che,
Ma kʼamo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩
ma la kʼe̩bie̩ ki ma nʼudu n dafo,
Abe̩le̩ o̩la e-ma daji noj uko̩lo̩-ma,
Tak uwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo bʼamone̩-wñ ma,
tak i mʼuma ko jʼef o̩wo̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi,
Ame̩nebi-ma la fʼuma dema,
I gba ma tane̩ o̩gbe̩nugbe̩,
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ o̩pe̩cha-ma chewʼO̩jo̩ eju,
Tak i libekado alo-wñ kʼi kpe̩ todu ma,
I no̩ je̩ ñw ejumomi-ma ki che
Jadu wa, O Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa,
Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l le̩ ki nʼele,
